characters.story: To distribute wine with respect commands "Pay!" sharply allocating shares!
A chieftain with wine questions "Chyo? Am I chief?" curiously leading the tribe!
To venerate the wine altar sings "Zun!" cheerfully honoring with respect!
To abide by the walk of veneration sings "Zun!" cheerfully following rules!
Beans in a dish command "Doe!" sharply - peas stacked high!
A head with beans questions "Toe? Where's the chief?" curiously at the top!
Short arrow with beans bends down drooping saying "Dwan" - lacking length!
Ceremony altar full of jelly beans bends down drooping saying "Lee" - rites and customs!
A body with ceremony bones bends down drooping saying "Ti" - the physical form!
A drum of beans beats, bending down drooping saying "Goo" - rousing rhythm!
Joyful mouth and drum bend down drooping saying "Shi" - happiness and delight!
Kitchen cliff with beans questions "Choo? What's cooking?" curiously preparing meals!
Timber tree and drum command "Shoo!" sharply - leaking glue when beaten for more!
Blood in a dish bends down drooping saying "Shueh" - red liquid of life!
Exhausted brush sweeps blood, commanding "Jin!" sharply - completely used up!
To the utmost person exhausted bends down drooping saying "Jeen" - trying maximum!
A lid of grass covers blood, commanding "Gai!" sharply - canopy on top!
Temperature of water sings "Wen!" warmly - Marilyn giving bowl to prisoner feels lukewarm!
